item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Access
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Punte Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: Access
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Access
item.content:encoded:
Providing Best
Child Programe

We work every day to build the foundations for amazing futures, both for the child and for our community. Read More

Imagine. Make. Believe.

Look into the eyes of a young child and see the sparkle and wonder. Develop these passions and watch the adult bloom into someone special. At Littledino Center, we work every day to build the foundations for amazing futures.

The term Special Needs is a short form of Special Education Needs and is a way to refer to students with disabilities. The term Special Needs in the education setting comes into play.

Read More Mail Us

Discover Our
Educational Programs

Early Education

Children with better pre-reading skills, richer vocabularies.

Read More

ABC Program

Children with better pre-reading skills, richer vocabularies.

Read More

Pre Kindergarten

Children with better pre-reading skills, richer vocabularies.

Read More

We will take
care of your kids

We specialize in meeting the unique physical, emotional and developmental needs of children. Be sure your kids are safe with our great team of hard-working professionals.Our main priority is to provide excellent service so that parents can be 100% sure their kids are safe and taken care of! Read More Mail Us

Our Teachers and
Management Team

Jantet Green

Montessori Supervisor

Cathrine Jones

Preschool Teacher

Maria Tacher

Level 1 Instructer

Jodie Smith

Level 2 Instructor

Discover Our
Educational Programs
